items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new content type with the raw value you provide.

items.name: static let oneTimeCode: NSTextContentType
items.desc: A property that defines the content in a text-input area as a one-time code.

items.name: static let password: NSTextContentType
items.desc: A property that defines the content in a text-input area as a password.

items.name: static let username: NSTextContentType
items.desc: A property that defines the content in a text-input area as a username.
